short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A todo-list popup with easy access. Great for quick jots with a clean and aesthetic look.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this aesthetic, minimalist To Do List to keep track of tasks. Staying organized is the first step to success. Accomplish your goals with this extension!
